channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 4:42 p.m. Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Myrivsk Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 4:42 p.m. Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Myrivsk Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. #Мыривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
